ca.title: CA
ca.description: The path to the CA file

cert.title: Cert
cert.description: The path to the client cert file

key.title: Key
key.description: The path to the client key file

url.title: Url
url.description: The url of the broker to connect to. e.g. tcp://localhost. Must be prefixed with one of either `tcp://`, `mqtt://`, `ssl://`,`mqtts://`,  to denote the protocol for establishing a connection with the broker. `mqtts://`, `ssl://` will use the native certificates if no ca is specified

clientPrefix.title: Client Prefix
clientPrefix.description: Prefix for the mqtt client id. The client id will be generated as `client_prefix`_`id`_`timestamp`. Defaults to `arroyo-mqtt`

username.title: Username
username.description: The username for your mqtt cluster (if using auth)

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for your mqtt cluster (if using auth)
